mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, cmt.writer, us.name, room_img, score, TO_CHAR(cmt.regdate, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MM') AS regdate, content, target_id, room_num, comment_num, deleted, us.profile FROM comments cmt INNER JOIN users us ON cmt.writer=us.id WHERE room_num=#{room_num} ORDER BY comment_num DESC, num ASC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
SELECT COUNT(num) AS totalNum FROM comments WHERE room_num=#{room_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (num, writer, regdate, content, room_num, comment_num, score, deleted) VALUES (#{num}, #{writer}, SYSDATE, #{content}, #{room_num}, #{comment_num}, #{score}, 'no')
